name: Reconnaissance - Search Open Websites/Domains (T1593)
description: Detects attempts to gather information about open websites and domains through DNS queries, web requests, or domain reconnaissance tools. Adversaries often use these actions during the reconnaissance phase to collect publicly available data.
author: Wahid Hendrawan
query: process.name:(powershell.exe OR cmd.exe OR curl.exe) AND (process.args:(*Invoke-WebRequest* OR *Invoke-RestMethod* OR *curl* OR *nslookup* OR *Resolve-DnsName* OR *dig* OR *robots.txt* OR *sitemap.xml*))
